main.name: Piyush Gautam
main.description: Machine Learning and Data Science Enthusiast. Also working with ReactJs and creating creative websites for fun purposes, Currently trying to become everyday blogger. Any Support is appreciated!
main.bio: I’m a third-year Industrial And Systems Engineering undergraduate student at the Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur. My main specialization is in Quality Engineering Design And Manufacturing. From the beginning of 2019, I have taken many open online courses and developed many skills over time. Right now, I’m looking for a part-time internship in Data Science, Software Development and Machine learning. Contact me anytime.
main.contactmessage: Currently Looking for Data Science and Machine Learning interns. Contact me anytime.

resume.skillmessage: In the effort to excel something, you always wind up with something else

education.description: Course: Quality Engineering Design And Manufacturing (Mechanical Vertical) under Industrial And Systems Engineerig Department

My experience at Sri Chaitanya is among the most memorables in my life. Life without technology in 2019 sucks! I used to wake up at 6 and sleep at 12, thats the most hard-work I could have ever done. Many thanks to my caring professors who made me complete my journey and got me into IIT

work.description:
- Build predictive, forecasting, optimization and simulation models using statistics, Machine Learning and AI programs.
- Create a search engine based on statistical models to give the most relevant results.
- Optimize searches based on general preferences and interests.
